case.state: Are you really okay like that? You're not cold or anything?

You sure you don't wanna cover up first, honey?

The original Winsome Wasp, at your service!

Likewise, Estelle! You seem very well-mannered. I'm surprised you enjoy playing strip poker.

Yeah, that's an important heads up. Good looking out, Fina!

Yeah, sure thing! We needed one more player anyway!

Well, it's not the worst singing I've ever heard...
Well, It's not the worst singing I've ever heard...
Aww, don't be mad! Short girls are cute! I could shrink a foot or two if it makes you feel better.
If you think that's weird then don't worry. You ain't seen nothing yet!
Are you sure you're not thinking of dinosaurs? I'm pretty sure vampires have always been around.
What? You can't do something like that... for free! Let me at least set up a ticket booth or something. Capitalism is the core of our great nation!
That's okay! We can just pretend it's like a sleepover only it takes a couple of extra steps to get to the sexy negligee.
Hey, don't knock it until you've tried it. You try evolving a fully functional nervous and circulatory system. It's harder than it looks!
All right! I'm looking forward to it!
Haha! What a story, Nicole! You're such a kidder! You are kidding, right?
Uh-huh, I'm sure. Don't worry, I'm sure you'll win lots more tonight!
Oh, hi! Are you new here? Yeah, I know everything can be a little disorienting at first.
Hey, are you one of those cosplay fans? I love your hood, honey!
I have a pretty high metabolism so I only have to fly around and the pounds just melt off!
Oh my god, it's you! Can I have your autograph? I am, like, you're biggest fan! I loved you in The Matrix!
Well, aren't you just a sweetie! Do you want to be my little `honey'?
Wow, what a gorgeous outfit! Rarity always dresses in style... or am I thinking of someone else?
Wow, are you really playing strip poker blindfolded? You're a daring little devil, huh?
Who's this Squadron Supreme knock off?
Now that is seriously good style! Who's your designer?
Beating Spider-Woman will be a snap!
So, this is kind of awkward but if you see your dad tell him to keep his head down for awhile. Moon Knight's been on a real tear.
Aww, I just want to take you home and hold you and squeeze you and love you forever!
Is this supposed to be a Wonder Man crossplay? Because it's not working.
Who's this Squadron Supreme knock off?
Wait, I know you! You're... Dazzler? Boom-Boom? Sorry, all mutants look the same to me.
Wow, you are a big girl! You are a... big, big girl!
Um, can I get a new table? I still get nervous playing regular poker with Cap.
A virtual idol? So, you're not even really here? You're, like, a hologram?
'Felicia', huh? Seems to be a popular name among cat-women.
Hey, don't worry about it! It's natural to feel shy. Especially when you're about to get naked in front of strangers.
Aww, aren't you a little cutie! Don't let it get you down. Guys love short girls to cuddle with! Believe me, I'd know!
Oh my, you poor thing! You've had a hard life, haven't you?
No, why? Do you have an invisible friend? Me too! Her name is Sue.
What a beautiful language your people have!
But, like, a friendly Vampire Queen like Casper, right? This is my day off.

Green, huh? You're not prone to any anger issues, are you?
Yeah, all right! I'm ready to rock! This should be a great game!
Um, everyone can see this, right? There's a talking butterfly at the table. {small}I guess I shouldn't judge.

Um, everyone can see this, right? There's a talking ball of light with wings at the table. {small}I guess I shouldn't judge.
Is a ball of light with wings really going to playing strip poker with us? Now I've seen everything.
Um, bah weep granna weep ninny bong?
Don't be so hard on yourself! I'm sure you have some talent just waiting to blossom!

Sure, but look at the bright side. I bet you're great at raves! Just attach some tassels to your nubs and you're good to go!
Hey, I think I can see my penthouse from here!
Swanky.
What the hell is going on out there? I left my windows down!
Hey, I think I can see my penthouse from here!
Dave! You came! This is going to be so much fun!

Hey, we're twinsies!
Is it really necessary to bring a gun to a poker game? This isn't the wild west.
Is it really necessary to bring a weapon to a poker game? This isn't feudal japan.
Okay, who let the Ani-Men out of jail?
Oh no. Are the Ani-Men on another rampage?
Whoa, are you sure okay doing this? This isn't exactly a game a princess plays.
I thought there'd be more people here. But this is kind of intimate in its own way!
If you're wondering where my wings are, I only have them when I'm shrunk.
Don't worry about my wings. They never show up at this size.
Don’t worry, my wings are still here. They’re just really small and hard to see from the front.
If you're wondering where my wings are, don't worry about it. I only ever use them when I'm shrunk.
It's a good thing I don't have wings at this size. That would get real awkward real quick!
Yeah, I think I see a flaw in your brilliant plan.
Whoa! Wait a minute!
I don't think I like the sound of that... Exactly how many people are watching us right now?
Yeah, this is fine. I don't need to have the best hand, just not the worst.
Yes! That's what I'm talk- Uh... I mean, whatever. This is fine.
Hit me! Wait... sorry, wrong game!
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... How about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Gimme ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. No, wait... yeah ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, if you would be so kind.
Would you kindly give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I'll take ~cards.text~ of your finest cards!
What to do... what to do... Okay, give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Okay, I've decided. I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
All right, I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll swap out ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ and see if that helps.
If you're ever in New York, you have to treat yourself and eat at La Bernardin. Best restaurant in the city!
I miss the Big House. It was this miniaturized supervillain prison Hank owned. It was like having my own dollhouse where all the dolls were real bad guys I could tease. It was great!
I have the best job ever! Successful, talented fashion designer and super cute, awesome superhero? Dreams achieved!

My favorite kind of bad guy to fight are the big armored ones like Crimson Dynamo or Titanium Man. I just sneak in through a seam in their armor, start blasting, and there's nothing they can do about it!
Henchmen are so dumb! Give them a little scare and they'll lead you right to their boss's secret lair! It's easy and fun!
I bet Sue would love hanging out here and meeting everyone! She could use it after being held captive by the Skrull Empire. Oh, but is invisibility considered cheating?
It's not Friday, is it? I need to restock on cereal and then be up early for my cartoons!
Everyone thinks the Hulk is a monster, but he's actually a sweetheart! He just has trouble opening up to people... and not smashing them.
Sometimes we like to bet how long it'll take Thor to brag about his hammer in a fight. So far, the longest he's gone is three minutes.
Our space armor is cool, but I'd love to give it a design upgrade. The red and white really clashes with my color scheme!

Hey, since I came up with the name Avengers I should get a cut of the royalties, right? I wonder who I need to invoice for that?
Are puns too cliché these days? I've been thinking about including some in my quips. Beelieve it!
I was born and raised in New Jersey but moved to New York when I met Hank. Despite everything, I don't regret a thing.
Before I became a superhero I was just a bored, society playgirl. Now I get to save the world and bump elbows with the most powerful people on the planet. How awesome is that?
There's a special kind of fighting style I use when I'm shrunk. It's designed to use my size to my advantage and to strike at pressure points.
I'm actually working on my own screenplay right now! The Coming of the Avengers! It's all about my early adventures with Ant-Man and the formation of the Avengers.
Okay, so yes, I can technically control insects like Hank. But it's a really gross power so I don't like to use it.
I want to be very clear about this. I am not Hank's sidekick. I am his partner. I don't think anyone still uses sidekicks anymore.
I think I might have to get a new chauffeur. Charles has been acting really familiar and creepy lately. Is it considered rude to fire someone by text message?

Don't get me wrong, being an Avenger is the best, but I could do without trips to the Savage Land. It's so gross! There are mosquitoes the size of dogs and mutates everywhere!
I hate it when a bad guy we beat turns out to be mutant. Not that I have anything against mutants, but it means we have to deal with those Mutant Response Division jerks.
The JARVIS program is great and all, but sometimes I feel like we need a real butler going around and... I don't know, butlering everything.
I just don't understand why anyone would want to hole up in a stuffy lab when there's a whole world to see and so many bad guys who need a smack in the mouth.
If I never go back to the Negative Zone and Annihilus it'll be too soon. Way too many creepy bugs for my taste. And that's coming from someone dressed as a creepy bug.
I hate when people think I'm the weakest Avenger. What about Hawkeye? All he does is shoot arrows! He could be replaced by Guy with a Gun.
We really need more women on the team. Carol is a good start, but maybe we should start holding auditions. What's the worst that could happen?
I don't understand why some heroines feel the need to include stilettos on their costume. Sure, they look hot but they're so impractical and will probably end up getting you killed.
I really hate the rich bitch stereotype. Just because I have money doesn't mean I can't kick ass and have fun!

Okay, I'm officially in trouble.
So this seems like it's going bad.
And what am I, chopped liver?! Kids today are so rude.
Oh... Are you okay, Susie? I know people you can talk to if you want help with that.
Happy birthday, Jura! If I'd known I would've gotten you something!
All the time! Honestly, they're the highlight of my day. Life would be so boring if there weren't bad guys to beat up!
Wow, that's really cool! Nature is so fascinating...
Wow, that's really interesting! Nature is so fascinating...
Wow, that's really cool! Nature is so fascinating...
Wait, so then does nature magic beat friendship magic? I'm confused about the power levels at work here.
...You know, that was almost a touching moment until you mentioned cumming.
I've been to Christmas parties if that counts. Christmas day is usually spent at home relaxing.
Aww, how cute! That's almost too wholesome for a strip game!
Hey, looking good, Emi! I bet you'd make a rocking cheerleader!
Oh, shit! What happened? Did you drop your cards?
So, listen, I'm straight as an arrow and that is the hottest thing I've ever seen!
Oh, thank goodness! I was worried it was permanent. I wouldn't have wished that on my worst enemy!
Oh. Wow... this took a turn. Um... Kiss! Kiss! Kiss!
Oh my god... Would you two just to fuck already?
Pfft! Yeah, a bit is right.
Ah, a man after my own heart! Good taste. I'd do the same!

Yeah, I'm fine. Talk about a jump scare!
Yeah, seriously. Isn't there a `No Cameras' rule here?
Yeah, you tell her, Miku! Someone needs to stand up against this blatant disregard of our privacy!
I don't mind! Normally, I'm the only girl on an all guys team so this is a nice change of pace.
Don't worry, I'm sure it's fine. Things like that just kind of happen around here.
Ooh, pick flight! Flight's awesome! Unless you're one of those creeps who'd rather be invisible instead.
It's a poor craftsman who blames his tools, Kazuma.
Aww, poor Kazuma! He thinks he's being intimidating with that little penis.
Hey, don't worry about it. This is a safe space. You don't have to talk about it if you don't want to...
Hey, come on. There's no need to cheat. It's not like there's actually a prize for winning.
Happy birthday, Jura! Sorry I didn't get you anything.
All right, if you say so, sweetie.
Are you sure? I mean, I guess they sound similar.. Maybe I just can't hear it.
Why not? What's-- Oh! Wow, those are some blue boobs! Is your friend Kree?
Happy birthday, Meia! If I'd known I would've gotten you something!
Happy birthday, Petra! If I'd known I would've gotten you something!
Whatever sounds good, I guess. I mostly just use music as background noise for whatever I'm working on.
Happy birthday, Meia! If I'd known I would've gotten you something!
Ah, yes, the old `check my tan lines' line. If you want to show off for ~player~ then just do it! I'm sure no one here will mind.
God, I hope so. It's probably best not to think about it.
That's awesome! I wish I could screw with bad guys like that!
Honestly, I'm not really a fan of all the metal parts. No offense, but I prefer the `au naturale` look.
Don't worry about it! It's actually really charming. It gives off that air of mystique that guys like in foreign girls.
Aww, how sweet! You two are so cute together!
Ha! You nailed it! I couldn't have put it better myself!
Aww, isn't that cute. You two are so adorable together!
Hey, you're actually pretty cute when you smile! It's a good look on you!
Oh well, at least now you know. You can't win if you don't play!
Yeah, it's not exactly a polite conversation topic...
...Great. Now I'm hungry. I wonder if there are any dessert places close to here that I can hit up later.

condition.saying: Does heaven still have a plan for me?

case.state: I'm not much of a singer, to be honest. But if you want to, go ahead!
Happy birthday, Jason! Now let us know how old you are so we know how many spankings to give you.
I've never really thought about it. Can you imagine? Someone could just walk in at any time and get an eyeful!
Why would we hide? We should wave and give them a show!
Video game?! No fair! I want to play!
Happy birthday, Wikipe-tan! If I'd known I would've gotten you something!
Happy Birthday, Miku! Now tell us how old you are so we know how many spankings to give you.
Is this like a `Heart of the Cards' thing? I don't think I'm prepared for that kind of anarchy.
Ha! I wish I had that problem! I've been told I don't give enough exposition!
Ha ha ha ha! Okay, I don't care who you are. That's funny!
I hate to break it to you, but I don't think this is the time or place for relationship advice...
Happy birthday, Miki! If I'd known I would've gotten you something!
Um, what? I don't understand what you're doing.
Um, I think I know some dirty limericks. Do those count? "There once was a girl from Madras..."
I think I'm going to work on my tan later. I feel like I could use some color.
Oh dear, do you usually have trouble controlling your powers? If you'd like, there's a special school in Westchester I could refer you to that specializes in that sort of thing.
Not really. I've got a pretty high metabolism. I usually just burn off whatever I eat.
Yeah, at least until the next megalomaniac with a giant robot shows up. I swear, those are getting more and more common.
Listen. Fluttershy. No offense, but I came here to get away from ant facts.
Aaah, why would you say that?! I don't need to hear about snail mutilation!
I have no problem with flies and cockroaches as long as they stay out of my airspace! Now, spiders on the other hand...
Yeah, thanks for that image. I could have gone my whole life without knowing that...
Sorry, that's not really my thing. I don't go for all the mushy stuff.
Beedrill, I guess? I haven't really kept up with Pokémon since the originals.
Go for it! I've always wanted to see a belly dance!
No, I'm more into instant gratification. If I want to eat something I just do it!
Don't worry, I don't think we'll be doing much sleeping...
Just keep trying! Maybe start with a small circle of friends and see where it goes from there!
What do you mean by `punish?' Like, an S&M thing? I never really got into any of that...
What, really? We don't have to go into all that age nonsense do we? You're only as old as you feel, right? Well, I may be twenty-six but I taste eighteen!
Whoa! Watch where you're waving that thing!
You go, Miku! Way to get into the spirit of the season!
Uh, no thanks. I'm very happy with my powers right where they are, thank you.
Kyou, you are a scary lady...
Whoa, chill out, Haru! It's just a game.
Yeah, I don't think so. I'm already set for life!
Well, it depends. I wouldn't worry about it, honestly. You don't need to have the best hand to win, just make sure you don't have the worst.
Yeah, that sounds great! I learned some of my best moves playing video games!
Have you tried just pissing it off really good? Maybe it'll slam into a wall and be stunned for a few seconds.
Ooh, I'd like an adult root beer, please! It's just one part Rum Chata and three parts A&W root beer. It's the best!
There aren't any dragons where I'm from but I've heard that the planet Maklu IV is nothing but dragons!
That's really a matter of perspective, isn't it? I'm from Earth for what it's worth.
Thanks, but no thanks. I'm more comfortable picking on bad guys my own size. ...You know what I mean.
This one's just for fun and it fits my theme. I have more serious works back at my design studio.

I'm from New York by way of New Jersey. It's essentially just a bunch of huge buildings crammed together, nobody drives a car because of all the traffic, and it costs an arm and a leg to live there. Great pizza, though.
People sometimes say I talk about myself too much. ...Also, that I don't talk about myself enough. It's confusing.
A pleasure to meet you, Rarity! I always love meeting another fashion enthusiast.
Oh, um... Sorry, that's not really my thing. But don't let me stop you!
Now that you mention it, there is this cute synthezoid that just joined the team. But I think he's looking for someone more down to earth.
Honestly? Just go for it! Don't be coy or play hard to get. {small}It might end up working.

I'm from New York by way of New Jersey. It's essentially just a bunch of huge buildings crammed together, nobody drives a car because of all the traffic, and it costs an arm and a leg to live there. Great pizza, though.
I'm just here to have fun and get off! That's really all there is to it.
Yeah, the guys and I get together every Friday night with friends for drinks and poker. I'm pretty good if I do say so myself. And I do.
I'm a little concerned about how casually you just admitted that...
No offense, Mari, but I could've gone my whole life without knowing any of that.
Believe me, It's just as weird for the rest of us. I don't know how you can stand all that body hair!
Everyone here better know the rules. I still can't believe it's not required.
We protect the Earth from any giant space men that want to attack it. And do you know how many giant space men there are in space? Hundreds. Literally, hundreds.
Wow, yeah that's quite the fashion statement! It looks amazing! A+ effort, honestly!
I don't know about strongest, but Whirlwind is the most persistent. I'm starting to think he's sweet on me!
Yeah, I can understand you fine now. Good thing, too! I don't understand moon-speak.
It's more than appealing, it's breathtaking! Have you ever thought about being a model?
Hey, don't worry about it, Perona! Some guys are really into that! More `cushion for the pushin' as they say!
Pleased to meet ya! Honestly, I've had weirder introductions.
Gifts! Flowers, chocolate, jewelery, and more! The more you spend, the more it means you love her!
I mostly just stick to the tabloids and fashion magazines. I actually can't remember the last time I read a book!
Aww, fun! You're so cute!
Yeah, yeah, there's no need to brag. Some of us aren't as blessed in the butt area.
I don't really do as much reading as I used to. Usually, I'll just wait for the movie to come out.
Uh, not really. That sounds like a lot of work. If I want to do something, I do it. If I don't want to do something, I don't do it.
I enjoy fashion and fashion accessories. Oh, and beating the pulp out of bad guys! That's always fun!
Maybe? I guess it depends on your definition of winning and worth it.
Just go for it! Lay it all out on the table! Playing hard-to-get is more likely to backfire.
...I want to be mad at you for teasing us but it would make me feel like a hypocrite.
Yeah, laugh while you can, Jura! I'm in it to win it!
Hey, I could have a butt like that if I wanted to. It just causes too much drag when I'm flying.
Goodness! Aren't you bold? You must be in a hurry to get naked.
Ha! No, it actually means the opposite. It's when you move your face as little as possible so your opponent can't tell what you're thinking.
Ugh, pass. I hate that game. Can we please just focus on this one instead?
Oh? We're allowed to use powers to cheat? All right, game on!
I really like nerdy, science guys as long as they don't get too wrapped up in their work.
